tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rajesh Gandhi is highly recommended for dental issues! Met him for teeth straightening in 2021.  I had had lot of anxiety going to a dentist but my entire treatmment journey with him of next 2.5 years has been very smooth and comfortable. He is extremely professional and an amazing orthodontist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rajesh Gandhi, with his gentle and friendly interaction gives a lot of confidence to the patient. Most people are scared to go to a dentist but a visit to Ivory Dental Clinic will change that fear into confidence. The confidence of getting top class treatment.
reply_text: Thanks for sharing your experience and giving encouragement to us and our entire team. Really means a lot to us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The experience was very good. The doctor was quite friendly and professional and we felt free to discuss about any thing regarding the treatment. We reached late to the appointments few times and he was patient enough to gracefully wait for us. Our big thanks to him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the appreciation, it was indeed a great pleasure to have addressed your dental issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Wonderful person who gives adequate time, expert hand and use latest technology and tools to help patients.
Totally satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Excellent service! Very professional. 
I am nee in India and recently moved to Delhi. Can recommend this dentist
reply_text:
Thank you so much for taking your time and reviewing us. We are glad to be of help in resolving your dental concerns.
Thanks again!

review: **** ******* ** **** ***** The best experience I have had with any health professional yet. Very happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Rajesh is an extremely humble and skill full doctor.  I went for the clear correct  invisible aligners and they worked very well on me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Gandhi gives us a sense of satisfaction with his treatment. He always makes it a point to explain his treatment method which brings in trust in him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for such beautiful words of encouragement and appreciation. It's indeed a pleasure to have such cheerful and positive patients in our practice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Rajesh is really friendly and I would recommend him for sure for other persons in need for dental ortho fixing.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your compliments, I am really humbled.
